content: in the same stitch as the join round 1 make a magic_ring if you don t know how there are some great tutorials on youtube chain 2 11 double_crochet in the magic_ring pull tight join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 11 round 2 2 double_crochet in the same stitch as join and in each stitch around **join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 22 round 3 beginning in the same stitch as join * 1 double_crochet in first stitch *2 double_crochet in the next stitch* repeat from *around **join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 33 round 4 *1 double_crochet in each of the first 2 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch* repeat around **join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 44 round 5 *1 double_crochet in each of the first 3 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch* repeat around **join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 55 round 6 *1 double_crochet in each of the first 10 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch* repeat around **join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 60 round 7 *fpdc around first stitch bpdc around next stitch* repeat around **join to the first fpdc of the round and chain 2 60 round 8 1 double_crochet in each stitch around **join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 60 round 9 1 double_crochet in each stitch around **join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 60 round 10 *fpdc around first stitch bpdc around next stitch* repeat around **join to the first fpdc of the round and chain 2 60 round 11 1 double_crochet in each stitch around **join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 60 round 12 1 double_crochet in each stitch around **join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 60 leesa nixon aka leesa s knotty corner ©2020-2021 this pattern is for personal use only it may not be copied reproduced edited or modified in any way or manner and claimed as your own all online please credit me 5 round 13 *fpdc around first stitch bpdc around next stitch* repeat around **join to the first fpdc of the round and chain 1 60 switch to g hook round 14 half_double_crochet around **join to first half_double_crochet and chain 1 60 round 15 half_double_crochet in third loop around **join to first half_double_crochet and chain 1 60 round 16 half_double_crochet in third loop around **join to first half_double_crochet and chain 1 60 round 17 single_crochet in third loop around **join to the first single_crochet 60 fasten_off and sew in ends leesa nixon aka leesa
